title: LOVECRAFT COUNTRY Episode 7 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: Fun fact: Orithyia Blue's spaceship is called "Stoney" which is similar to Hippolyta's car, "Woody".
Absolutely love this episode. As a black woman it made me smile seeing Hippolyta’s liberation.

I love how this show drops Black History gems like Bessie Stringfield riding the motorcycle, the African Amazons and Josephine Baker!! Also did anyone notice Hippolyta and daughter Dee is short for Diana. Aka Wonder Woman history. Wonder Woman's real name is Diana and her mother was Hippolyta.

“We teach girls to shrink themselves, to make themselves smaller. We say to girls, you can have ambition, but not too much. You should aim to be successful, but not too successful. Otherwise, you would threaten the man.” - Chichimanda Ngozi Adichie
Those lines Hippolotta says to Josephine just broke my heart man
description:
In this video we take a deep dive, review, recap, and breakdown episode 7 "I am" of HBO's latest series Lovecraft Country based off the book by Matt Ruff. Review, recap, and easter eggs!
